Name: Heart'n Block
About the game: An Arkanoid like game featuring 100 stages of color madness with blocks, hearts and cute girls mixed in! Makes use of the white heart shaped ball and your platform to destroy the colored blocks. Learn to use and master powerful permanent bonus to help you against this madness of color! Be sure to avoid malus as they will only make your life harder. Get ready for the fireworks! Main features - 100 Stages will lead you to meet the girls one by one before mixing them up. - Play randomly generated stages in four different size : small, medium, large and very large. - In-game editor to let go of your creativity. - In-game gallery to look and choose the background girl you want. - 11 different blocks to destroy that will release a heart shaped ball, a bonus or a malus. - 20 different cute and sexy girls on stage to help or destroy you! - A range of 8 powerful bonus to choose from for the course of the stage. - Many special effects done by the girls, balls and everything else to turn the stage into a complete chaos of colors! - 3 ways to play : mouse, touchscreen and controller.
